thread.title: Digital WarRoom Expands Executive Team -- Justin D. Farmer, President and General Counsel
thread.title_full: Digital WarRoom Expands Executive Team -- Justin D. Farmer, President and General Counsel - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Digital WarRoom Expands Executive Team -- Justin D. Farmer, President and General Counsel
text:
Digital WarRoom
SEATTLE , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Digital WarRoom announced today that it has continued the expansion of its Senior Executive Team with the addition of industry veteran, Justin D. Farmer , as President and General Counsel.
Farmer brings extensive business, litigation, and eDiscovery experience to the Digital WarRoom team. A former Assistant Attorney General, private practitioner, and Director of eDiscovery services, Farmer has been responsible for advising law firms and in-house counsel on eDiscovery solutions for complicated legal matters.
Farmer will lead Digital WarRoom's aggressive and price-disruptive service model: Digital WarRoom Private Cloud. Clients who wish to move their eDiscovery infrastructure to a hosted solution, and challenge the status quo, will want to "Capitalize on our price-disruptive model. We have moved away from the aged per GB pricing. The cost of hosted storage should not be prohibitive. Every firm, large or small, and every in-house legal team, whether many or few, will have access to a just, speedy, and inexpensive eDiscovery solution," Farmer says. With the new Digital WarRoom Private Cloud, law firms and in-house legal departments will be able to subscribe and have immediate access to a platform that allows unlimited processing, review, and production, with hosted storage included.
Based in Seattle , Farmer leads Digital WarRoom's new Private Cloud offering globally. Digital WarRoom founder Bill Gallivan said, "We are delighted to substantially expand our team with the addition of Mr. Farmer to our executive office. We are seeing incredible interest in our best in class eDiscovery software and Justin has already had a huge impact on the success of Digital WarRoom's Private Cloud sales. 2016 looks to be our best year yet."
About Digital WarRoom
Digital WarRoom has been acclaimed by eDiscovery experts, law firms, and corporate clients as "impressive, seamless, and easy to use." A Law Technology News (LTN) product review compared the platform favorably with better-known, but far more expensive solutions, saying "[Digital WarRoom] seems to have adopted the best two or three features offered by leading e-discovery software makers such as Clearwell and kCura Relativity and packaged them all together in one functional, integrated platform, which can operate on a desktop, or laptop, computer in a distributed computing environment that incorporates other computers, such as a back-end database server."
Digital WarRoom now provides law firms, corporate legal departments and eDiscovery teams access to an all-in-one enterprise software: from ECA and processing to document review and productions, you can do it all within Digital WarRoom's Private Cloud environment. Digital WarRoom is eliminating traditional high cost volume-based processing fees, reducing the risk inherent in moving data between disparate systems, and helping clients increase efficiency.
To learn more about Digital WarRoom visit http://www.digitalwarroom.com .
